瀕.definition: to approach; to border on; near

瀕危.definition: endangered (species); in imminent danger; critically ill

瀕危野生動植物種國際貿易公約.pinyin: bīn wēi yě shēng dòng zhí wù zhǒng guó jì mào yì gōng yuē
瀕危野生動植物種國際貿易公約.definition: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora; CITES

瀕死.definition: nearing death; on the point of demise; approaching extinction

瀕臨.definition: on the edge of; (fig.) on the verge of; close to
